ICD-10-CM Codes

Source: R/icd_pin.R
icd10cm.Rd

ICD-10-CM (International Classification of Diseases, 10th Revision, Clinical Modification) is a medical coding system for classifying diagnoses and reasons for visits in U.S. health care settings.

Usage

icd10cm(icd = NULL, ...)

Arguments

icd

<chr> vector of ICD-10-CM codes

...

Empty dots

Value

a tibble

Examples

icd10cm(
   c("F50.8", "G40.311", "Q96.8",
     "Z62.890", "R45.4", "E06.3",
     "H00.019", "D50.1", "C4A.70"))
#> # A tibble: 9 × 11
#>      ch abb   chapter_name  chapter_range section_name section_range order valid
#>   <int> <chr> <chr>         <chr>         <chr>        <chr>         <int> <int>
#> 1     2 ONC   Neoplasms     C00 - D49     Merkel cell… C4A - C4A.9    1599     1
#> 2     3 BLOOD Diseases of … D50 - D89     Iron defici… D50 - D50.9    3421     1
#> 3     4 METAB Endocrine, n… E00 - E89     Thyroiditis  E06 - E06.9    3868     1
#> 4     5 PSYCH Mental, beha… F01 - F99     Eating diso… F50 - F50.9    5946     0
#> 5     6 NEURO Diseases of … G00 - G99     Epilepsy an… G40 - G40.919  6329     1
#> 6     7 EYE   Diseases of … H00 - H59     Hordeolum a… H00 - H00.19   7045     1
#> 7    17 CONG  Congenital m… Q00 - Q99     Turner's sy… Q96 - Q96.9   30028     1

#> 9    21 STAT  Factors infl… Z00 - Z99     Problems re… Z62 - Z62.9   96381     1
